column5: ",,,,,,,,,,Fannie,,Great Service and Awesome Repairman ,"Your Best Choice for Furnace and Air Conditioning Repair in Baton Rouge, LA","In the Walker, Baton Rouge, Hammond & surrounding Louisiana areas, Ward Mechanical Contractors is well known for providing exceptional ac repair, installation, and service. column6: Mike S. was my repairman that came out. He gave me excellent service, information and figured the problem with my air conditioning system. The cost was exceptional. We have been customers for numerous years and will continue to be. I highly recommend Ward Mechanical services to anyone that need a reliable air conditioning service company.
